data.title: Wonderful
data.text: My husband and I just finished eating here and it delicious & large portions. The owner is a very nice man. Definitely will be back soon.

data.title: Clean, nice people, the owner always give me some extra food
data.text: Fabulous !!!  I work down town Worcester and I get my lunch and sometime my diner here too.  Very healthy food and lean, no grease.  light in your body.  I never had a bad meal.  Nataja Ruizduran

data.title: Shawarma  Palace - Great Food and Friendly Atmosphere
data.text:
A friend and I tried Shawarma Palace for lunch after reading some good reviews. It lived up to the reviews we had seen. I had the Beef Shawarma Wrap and my companion had the Kibbeh plate - both of which were delightful and well presented.

This is a small place with just a few tables. It is very warm and cozy and the owner is so attentive to every person that we felt like we had known him for a long time. It is very clean and service is fast and efficient. Shawarma is a storefront counter which seems to do a lot of take out business as well as serving those who are staying to eat there.

As we were leaving the owner gave us a piece of his special Baklava. It was delicious and we were so pleased with this gesture.

I took two spinach pizzas home. They were awesome. The also offer meat pies pies, spinach pies and other types of pizza.  Will be going back!

There is street parking or a parking garage is nearby

data.title: Best Shawarma Ever!
data.text: The Best Beef Shawarma we have had ever!  It was so soft and tender and flavorful. We enjoyed the garlic sauce too. We also tried Kibbeh, and it was so fresh and good. The owner is very personable. He explained what we have as options and ingredients for other dishes too.  For a bit we were alone in the restaurant so we had a wonderful chat with the owner. We look forward to more meals at Shawarma Palace.

data.title: Fabulous!!!
data.text:
My daughter & I stopped in for dinner before an event. Both of us Love Lebanese food & I have to say - the food here is Fabulous!!! I'm not a huge fan of falafel, but I am here! Fresh & tasty!!! Hummus even us Irish like!!! Plenty of regulars coming in while we were there.
Thank you Charles, it was so good - we will be baaaack!

data.title: AWESOME food!
data.text: I cannot believe we have missed this place all this time. You walk into a smaller dining room and then the owner is there with the most friendly personality ever. He explained some of the items on the menu for us and let us sample some of the shawarma meat. We ordered 2 chicken salads and one beef. While we waited, we sampled some awesome hummus. The food was awesome, pita bread was soft.  I have taken home tabouli & baklava & both were awesome. I will definitely be back here many times.

data.title: Carefully Prepared Lebanese Food
data.text: I was here for lunch on a Saturday.  The restaurant was not busy (I was the only customer).  The owner was working behind the counter preparing chicken for the shawarma.  He stopped what he was doing, cleaned up, greeted me and carefully prepared the food I ordered.  This kind of personal attention to the food doesn't exist at many places and shows the amount the owner cares about his restaurant.  I've tried both the chicken and beef shawarma and both are great.  The food is all made in-house, and is all fresh and delicious.
